description: Statement for an account for a given billing cycle

account_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the account

effective_as_of_date.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE tell me what the account information was as if I had asked on `2020-10-20 00:00:00 EST`. If empty it defaults to current time.

credit_limit_cents.description: Total Amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

total_charges_cents.description: Sum of all charges that occurred on the account since account origination.

available_credit_cents.description: The total available credit balance (in cents) for the account.

purchase_window_close_date.description: The `Date-Time` the purchase window for the account ends.

billing_cycle_start_date.description: The inclusive starting `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

billing_cycle_end_date.description: The inclusive ending `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

billing_cycle_purchases_cents.description: Sum of all charges that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_returns_cents.description: Sum of all returns that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_payments_cents.description: Sum of all payments that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_payment_reversals_cents.description: Sum of all payment reversal amounts that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_debit_adjustments_cents.description: Sum of all debit adjustment amounts that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_credit_adjustments_cents.description: Sum of all credit adjustment amounts that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_interest_accrued_cents.description: Total interest accrued during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_deferred_interest_accrued_.description: Total interest accrued during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_late_fees_cents.description: Total late fees incurred during the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_payment_reversal_fees_cent.description: Total payment reversal fees incurred during the billing cycle.

current_principal_due_cents.description: Current principal due for the billing cycle.

current_interest_due_cents.description: Current interest due for the billing cycle.

current_deferred_interest_due_cents.description: Current deferred interest due for the billing cycle.

payment_due_date.description: The `Date-Time` the payment for this billing cycle is due.

principal_balance_cents.description: Total principal balance for the account.

interest_balance_cents.description: Total interest balance for the account.

deferred_interest_balance_cents.description: Total deferred interest balance for the account.

fees_balance_cents.description: Total fee balance for the account.

total_balance_cents.description: The total balance (in cents) associated with the account.

total_payoff_amount_cents.description: The total amount slated to pay off the account over the lifecycle of the loan.
